mapper.insert: INSERT INTO resume_user_information ( resumeUserName, resumeBirthDay, resumeGender, resumeUserEmail, resumeUserPhone, resumeUserCellPhone, resumeUserAddress, resumeProfilePhoto, resumeSkillName, resumePortfolio, resumePageUserId, resumeEduStage, resumeSchoolName, resumeCpName, resumeCpDept, resumeCpJoinDate, resumeCpLeaveDate, resumeCpPosition, resumeCpDuty, resumeCpSalary, resumeIntroduce ) VALUES ( #{resumeUserName}, #{resumeBirthDay}, #{resumeGender}, #{resumeUserEmail}, #{resumeUserPhone}, #{resumeUserCellPhone}, #{resumeUserAddress}, #{resumeProfilePhoto}, #{resumeSkillName}, #{resumePortfolio}, #{resumePageUserId},#{resumeEduStage}, #{resumeSchoolName}, #{resumeCpName}, #{resumeCpDept}, #{resumeCpJoinDate}, #{resumeCpLeaveDate}, #{resumeCpPosition}, #{resumeCpDuty}, #{resumeCpSalary}, #{resumeIntroduce} )
